DESCRIPTION: Unified FAQ and offline assistance system

HOW_TO_START.question: How do I start using uDOS?
HOW_TO_START.answer: Run './start_udos.sh' from the terminal. First time: SETUP wizard guides you through configuration.

LIST_FILES.question: How do I see what files are available?
LIST_FILES.answer: Use CATALOG to list files in current directory, or CATALOG "<path>" for specific directory.

LOAD_FILE.question: How do I load a file?
LOAD_FILE.answer:
Use: LOAD "<filename>" TO "<panel_name>"
Example: LOAD "data/STORY.UDT" TO "main"

SAVE_FILE.question: How do I save my work?
SAVE_FILE.answer:
Use: SAVE "<panel_name>" TO "<filename>"
Example: SAVE "main" TO "my_work.txt"

CREATE_PANEL.question: How do I create a new panel?
CREATE_PANEL.answer:
Use: GRID PANEL CREATE "<name>"
Example: GRID PANEL CREATE "notes"

USE_OK_ASSISTED_TASK.question: How do I use OK Assisted Task features?
USE_OK_ASSISTED_TASK.answer:
Requires internet connection. Use: OK "<question>" or OK "<question>" FROM "<panel>"
Example: OK "Summarize this" FROM "main" or OK "What is uDOS?"

EDIT_FILE.question: How do I edit a file?
EDIT_FILE.answer:
Use: EDIT "<filename>" (opens in configured editor)
Set editor: EDIT --editor <nano|vim|micro>
Install micro: EDIT --install-micro

FIX_ERRORS.question: Something isn't working, how do I fix it?
FIX_ERRORS.answer: Try: REPAIR (auto-fix common issues), UNDO (undo last action), or RESTORE <session> (restore previous state)

WEB_EXTENSIONS.question: How do I use web extensions?
WEB_EXTENSIONS.answer:
Use: EXTENSIONS START <name>
Available: font-editor, markdown-viewer, typo
Example: EXTENSIONS START markdown-viewer

VIEW_STRUCTURE.question: How do I see the repository structure?
VIEW_STRUCTURE.answer:
Use: TREE (full tree) or TREE <folder> for specific folder
Options: SANDBOX, MEMORY, KNOWLEDGE, HISTORY, CORE, WIKI, EXTENSIONS, EXAMPLES

SYSTEM_INFO.question: How do I check system status?
SYSTEM_INFO.answer: Use: DASH (full dashboard), STATUS (quick status), or VIEWPORT (display info)

OFFLINE_MODE.question: What works offline?
OFFLINE_MODE.answer: All commands work offline except OK (OK Assisted Task). Offline mode provides pattern-based assistance and local analysis.

QUICK_TIPS.tab_completion: Press TAB for command completion and suggestions
QUICK_TIPS.help_system: Use HELP <command> for detailed help on any command
QUICK_TIPS.command_history: Use UP/DOWN arrows to navigate command history
QUICK_TIPS.sandbox: sandbox/ is your workspace - test files here (gitignored)
QUICK_TIPS.memory: memory/ is for permanent storage - commit important work here
